mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_domainno.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
insert into domain (domainNo, domainNm, domainDataType, domainDefaultValue, erdNo) values (seq_domainno.nextval, #{domainNm}, #{domainDataType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domainDefaultValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erdNo})
mapper.select: select * from domain where domainNm like '%'||#{domainNm}||'%' and erdNo = #{erdNo} order by domainNo
mapper.insert: insert into erd_hist (erdHistNo, erdNo, erdDt, erdIsVisible, snapNm, snapImg, snapCdt, erdTitle, erdJson) values (seq_erdhistno.nextval, #{erdNo}, sysdate, #{erdIsVisible}, #{snapNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{snapImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{erdTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{erdJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from erd_hist where erdhistno = (select max(erdhistno) as erdhistno from erd_hist where erdNo = #{erdNo})
